tool_description:
🚀 Best TikTok API with rapid and reliable performance. Download videos, music, challenges, users and more! 🚀

#instagram #meta #download #inst #insta #tik #tok #facebook #youtube #shorts #reels #snapchat #scraper #2024 #hashtag #followers #following #feed #igtv #grabber #endpoint
name: TikTok Scrapper – Videos & Music & Challenges Downloader
title: TikTok Scrapper – Videos & Music & Challenges Downloader
tool_name: TikTok Scrapper – Videos & Music & Challenges Downloader

api_list.name: User's Followings
api_list.description: Get information about TikTok user's followings with UID / ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-scrapper-videos-music-challenges-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/user/id/7024281421016237058/followings"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-scrapper-videos-music-challenges-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-scrapper-videos-music-challenges-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/user/id/{user_id}/followings"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-scrapper-videos-music-challenges-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Users by Keyword
api_list.description: Get a list of TikTok users with a keyword

api_list.name: Search Challenges by Keyword
api_list.description: Get a list of TikTok challenges (hashtags) with a keyword

api_list.name: Trending Videos by Region
api_list.description: Download feed with trending TikTok videos from a specific region

api_list.name: Trending Videos
api_list.description: Download feed with trending videos from TikTok

api_list.name: Comments by Video_ID
api_list.description: Download all comments from a TikTok video with video_id

api_list.name: Challenge Feed by Keyword
api_list.description: Download a challenge(hashtags) feed with a keyword

api_list.name: Challenge Feed by ID
api_list.description: Download a challenge(hashtags) feed with challenge_id

api_list.name: Challenge by Keyword
api_list.description: Get data about challenge(hashtag) with a keyword

api_list.name: Challenge by ID
api_list.description: Get data about challenge(hashtag) by challenge_id

api_list.name: Music Feed by ID
api_list.description: Get Music feed data with music_id

api_list.name: Music Info by ID
api_list.description: Get data about Music with music_id

api_list.name: User's Feed by ID
api_list.description: Download a TikTok user's feed with UID / ID

api_list.name: Video by ID
api_list.description: Download videos from TikTok with Video ID

api_list.name: User's Followers
api_list.description: Get information about TikTok user's followers with UID / ID
